title: Allraan Artistry Package
description:
Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, featuring the game's soundtrack and a digital mini artbook. These items enhance your experience of Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes' story.
Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.
longDescription:
Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, featuring the game's soundtrack and a digital mini artbook. These items enhance your experience of Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes' story.
Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

Tracklist: 17 tracks
Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Motoi Sakuraba - 02:47
Arenside - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:47
Departure - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:12
Forest - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 01:56
Runebarrows - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:27
Abandoned Mine - Motoi Sakuraba - 03:03
Village - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:28
Together with Friends - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:00
Battle 1 - Motoi Sakuraba - 02:45
Battle 2 - Michiko Naruke / Motoi Sakuraba - 02:53
Under Boss - Motoi Sakuraba - 03:03
Ruins Boss - Motoi Sakuraba - 02:46
Flags of Brave - Sarah Alainn / Michiko Naruke / Motoi Sakuraba / Noriyuki Iwadare - 05:13
Seign's Theme - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:17
Marisa's Theme - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:48
Eltisweiss - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 02:19
Headquarters - Developing - Michiko Naruke / Noriyuki Iwadare - 01:49

Digital Mini Artbook is filled with 48 pages.

*Please be aware that this set is included in the Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Digital Deluxe Edition
*Please be careful not to purchase multiple times accidentally.
